original_text: from thirty years old up to fifty years old, everyone who could come to do the service of ministry and the service of bearing burdens in the tent of meeting,
korean_text: 삼십 세부터 오십 세까지 회막 봉사와 메는 일에 참여하여 일할 만한 모든 자

sentences.original_text: from thirty years old up to fifty years old,
everyone who could come to do the service of ministry
sentences.korean_translation: 성소의 봉사 직무를 수행하기 위해 온 자는

sentences.original_text: and the service of bearing burdens
